abstract.t: This short memo aims to discuss the different functions and topological areas of an internetwork, where some kind of enhancements are required in order to provide predictable end-to-end quality of service (QoS) to customers. These enhancements require (1) the exchange of QoS-related information and (2) enforcement of QoS-related decisions. This can be, but not necessarily is, done by some existing or new signaling protocols.
